resources.string: Welcome, dear developer. In this sample, you will see how I can map my environment to know where I am. And then, I will be able to relocalize myself.
We can create a new map and we will be able to use it later.
Do you want to create a new map or to use a saved map?
Make sure my back hatch is closed
Make sure I am not charging so I can move. Please double check if my back hatch is closed then press start.
Oops, something went wrong. Please check if there is nothing around me avoiding me to turn and scan, then try again.

Perfect! I\'ve created a map. But we are not done! Because this is a sample, you need now to ask me to localize myself. Let\'s go back to the main menu and continue the procedure with the localization.
